links.portion: Research Centre for Global Learning: Education and Attainment at Coventry University
Higher Education Funding Council for England

components.text: This website is a resource developed by the Research Centre for Global Learning: Education and Attainment at Coventry University. It was funded by the Higher Education Funding Council for England (HEFCE) as part of its catalyst fund. It aims to provide information, evidence-based support and guidance to students, university staff and educators/mentors in practice education with a view to enhancing placement experiences, particularly for disabled students.
